reviewText: I couldn't agree more that this dvd should be produced again. I've been looking for this dvd anywhere and I can't find it. I really hope that this dvd will be produced again so I can enjoy the videoclips of my favorite singer...

I live in Europe (Portugal).  k.d. lang's carrier is expanding all over the world since Reintarnation.  She is the most gorgeous voice in the moment.  Her fans are growing worldwide.  Many of us are doing an incredible work of sending/forwarding news, discs, videos to all our friends worldwide. We are spreading the word that k.d. lang is the most incredible voice of the moment. Nobody sings like her.  More and more people are getting interested in k.d.'s work as a songwriter, covers and voice.  Make your homework and take a look at her career for the past 3 years.  You people whose business is to make singers worldknown, don't you think it is high time to make a huge amount of copies of the DVD k.d. lang live in Sidney? as no one can find it for sale anywhere in the world and there is a crowd out there looking for it?  If you put that DVD on the market again I can assure you it will be  sold out in a short time.
Assuming making money by selling records is your business.... take your own conclusions.
